text: Conscience of Ukraine () is a political party in Ukraine registered in March 2005. The party did not participate in the 2006 Ukrainian parliamentary elections, in the 2007 elections, the party failed as part of the All- Ukrainian Community to win parliamentary representation. Політична партія "Совість України" , Database ASD During the 2010 Ukrainian local elections the party won representatives in municipalities and did particularly well in Poltava (winning 74% of the votes and it won the Mayoral election with 61% of the votes). На виборах мера Полтави переміг Олександр Мамай , Дзеркало тижня (November 6, 2010) Results of the elections, preliminary data, on interactive maps by Ukrayinska Pravda (November 8, 2010) But Poltava Mayor Oleksandr Mamay officially joined the ranks of the Party of Regions in July 2012. Мер Полтави вступив у Партію регіонів The mayor of Poltava joined the Party of Regions, The Ukrainian Week (21 July 2012) During the same 2010 elections Volodymyr Groysman was re-elected Mayor of Vinnytsia as a candidate of the party with 77.81% of the votes. Short bio of Volodymyr Groysman, LIGA The party did not participate in the 2012 parliamentary elections. Results of voting in single constituencies in 2012 & Nationwide list , Central Election Commission of Ukraine Again the party did not participate in the 2014 Ukrainian parliamentary election.Alphabetical Index of parties in 2014 Ukrainian parliamentary election , Central Election Commission of Ukraine In 2015 Ukrainian local elections Mamay was re-elected (as Mayor) in Poltava as again a candidate of Conscience of Ukraine with 62.9% in a second round of Mayoral election.Mamai reelected as Poltava mayor – election commission, Interfax- Ukraine (16 November 2015) == References == ==External links== * Official website Category:Political parties in Ukraine
title: Conscience of Ukraine
